definition: to vanish without trace (idiom)/to lie low

sentences.english: The once powerful figures have also disappeared from the scene one after another.
sentences.chinese: 那些烜赫一時的人物也一個個銷聲匿跡了。

sentences.english: After disappearing for two years, the gangster surfaced in Thailand last month.
sentences.chinese: 在消聲匿跡兩年之後，那個流氓上個月在泰國露面了。

sentences.english: And yet the anger and turmoil of that period never entirely drained away.
sentences.chinese: 但那個時期爆發的怒火和動盪從未完全銷聲匿跡。

sentences.english: Prime ministers and presidents are here today and gone tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 國家首相和總統今天還在，明天便已消聲匿跡。

sentences.english: Later, incense gradually concealment of the city.
The fashion industry would die like an insect in autumn.
sentences.chinese: 時裝業將會像秋後的昆蟲一樣銷聲匿跡。

sentences.english: E. g. 6: During the two previous centuries musical styles went in one era and out of another.
sentences.chinese: 在前兩個世紀，音樂風格時髦一陣，又很快銷聲匿跡。

sentences.english: Once a cost reduction program loses momentum, it eventually dies out.
sentences.chinese: 一旦降低成本計劃失去了活力，它最終就會消聲匿跡。

sentences.english: The good news is that Old Man Winter is sneaking out of town quietly, with more warmth on the way.
sentences.chinese: 好消息是冬天很快就會消聲匿跡，暖天氣馬上到來。

sentences.english: The rumour had to disappear before facts.
sentences.chinese: 在事實面前謠言只得銷聲匿跡。

sentences.english: Having been stripped of all his titles, he disappeared from public life.
sentences.chinese: 他被剝奪一切榮譽之後，就從公共生活中消聲匿跡了。

sentences.english: Now, however, most signs of the towns have disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 可是現在這些城鎮多數已經消聲匿跡了。

sentences.english: Most of the hallmarks of the foreign policy of George W. Bush are gone.
sentences.chinese: 布什的外交政策大部分的特徵已經消聲匿跡。

sentences.english: Onece the orbs nearby fall into the black hole, they will disappear forever.
sentences.chinese: 附近的天體一旦落入黑洞，就銷聲匿跡，永無蹤影。

sentences.english: Little trace of our current civilisation will remain.
sentences.chinese: 我們的當前文明將消失匿跡。
